Message:
Senpai keeps spending time
with someone like me.

He really doesn’t know
when to quit.

But before I knew it,
the entries in my book
had started to become
all about Senpai...

Oh look, hehehe,
I just wrote another one.

At this rate, I’m pretty sure
my book’s going to be filled
to the brim with him.

Today is day seven.
Tomorrow’s “me”
will be the new “me.”

So listen up, new “me”—
don’t forget to be nice to
Senpai, okay?

The first thing I wrote when
I met him was that I was only
helping him solve the Curses
in this world.
